overview: During the Womenâ€™s Soccer World Cup, on June 29 2019, the first international match took place where women over 60 years old faced off from France and South Africa. More than just a match, their journeys revealed how supporting one another and pursuing passions know no age or border. Soccer Grannies recounts with warmth and humour the fierce joy and friendship between women coming together to defy expectations.
title: Soccer Grannies
